channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flooding across road, 15th December
item.description:
There is flooding across the road that hasn’t subsided. Approaching from Gretton, there is a blind hill, and you have to pass it on the other side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Bins full and not fit for purpose, 15th December
item.description:
These bins by the Dugout are both full, one is overflowing. They're far too small for a busy field and cafe. If we have any wind the litter will blow all over the field and children's play area. Please can they be emptied urgently and replaced with larger bins with lids or similar to stop debris blowing out or being taken by wildlife

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of plastic stuck in hedge, 15th December
item.description:
Appearing to come from the building site opposite. Looks absolutely dreadful. Please can it be cleaned asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Fallen Tree on Cycle Route in Unsafe Position., 15th December
item.description:
A fallen tree on cycle route between North Upton Lane and Newstead Rd is unsafe. The tree is leaning on a lamp post and could fall onto cycle route. Please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Upton Lane, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Bin outside wok express and Tesco, 15th December
item.description:
The bin here was over flowing on 14 December. This happens regularly so wondered if could be emptied more often please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights keep going red, 14th December
item.description:
The traffic lights keep going red when you approach both from Barnwood and Elmbridge direction. Annoyingly they go red when there’s no one at the junction into the business park with the pub and Nuffield Health. This issue has been going on for months and happens at all times of day. It’s very inconvenient when you’re driving up to them and at the last minute they go red and cause you to have to slam breaks on to stop. Please could I get an update in relation to this. It seems they just need updating to only go red when someone’s wanting to enter or exit the business area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Another report on an ongoing problem, 14th December
item.description:
Your inability to fix a problem has left this road with more patches than a pirates Christmas party. Stop putting temporary fixes on this stretch of road and fix it. It was closed for 4 weeks and could’ve been done then. It’s beyond a joke and a huge risk to life as it’s either hit numerous holes or hit an on coming car. You have a duty of care to maintain. Stop bodge fixing a serious issue and resurface the highway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A damaged repair, 13th December
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 6207512 addressed failed repairs in Cold Pool Lane in July 2024. These repairs lasted a couple of months before the repair sank into ground and the road surface reverted back to pre July 2024. The houses either side of Cold Pool Lane/Symphony Road continue to suffer the shockwaves caused by vehicles travelling over the failed repair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
